title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 18 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 18 2021
description:
Why is the media ignoring the threats against the judge and jury members of the Rittenhouse trial? MSNBC staff attempted to follow a bus transporting Rittenhouse jury members. Will the left riot after the Rittenhouse verdict? How many parents, including Clay Travis, have been labeled domestic terrorists by the FBI? Senator Ron Johnson of Wisconsin returns to the show to respond to "Border Czar" Kamala Harris's immigration lies, will there be riots in his state over Rittenhouse trial, and C&B's question if he will run again. Will the National Guard deter riots in Kenosha? Kamala opens mouth, demonstrates why she's at 28% approval. Two-year-old fan: "I want Clay and Buck!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
